name: core-localstorage
title: Core localstorage
description:
Element access to localStorage.  The "name" property
is the key to the data ("value" property) stored in localStorage.

`core-localstorage` automatically saves the value to localStorage when
value is changed.  Note that if value is an object auto-save will be
triggered only when value is a different instance.

    <core-localstorage name="my-app-storage" value="{{value}}"></core-localstorage>

name.name: name
name.description: The key to the data stored in localStorage.
name.title: Name

value.name: value
value.description: The data associated with the specified name.
value.title: Value

useRaw.name: useRaw
useRaw.description: If true, the value is stored and retrieved without JSON processing.
useRaw.title: Use raw

autoSaveDisabled.name: autoSaveDisabled
autoSaveDisabled.description: If true, auto save is disabled.
autoSaveDisabled.title: Auto save disabled

core-localstorage-load.name: core-localstorage-load
core-localstorage-load.description: Fired when a value is loaded from localStorage.
core-localstorage-load.title: Core localstorage load
